class Unet_Learner[source]

Unet_Learner(model, train_generator, val_generator=None, opt=None, loss=None, metric=None, wd=0.01, lr=1e-05, workers=1, name='U-Net', use_multiprocessing=False)

Class used to train Keras models.

model (Model): tf.keras.Model train_data (Iterator): Iterator instance for training set val_data (Iterator): Iterator instance for validation set
